languages.text: "Плотьяз неинформативен". {n}Оптикон-22 надолго замирает, а затем изрекает:{/n} "Я осуществляю дипломатическое представительство флота, обеспечение поставок и наблюдение за тем, чтобы миряне не вторгались в зону интересов Эксплораторов".

"The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."
languages.original_text: "Плотьяз неинформативен". {n}Оптикон-22 надолго замирает, а затем изрекает:{/n} "Я осуществляю дипломатическое представительство флота, обеспечение поставок и наблюдение за тем, чтобы миряне не вторгались в зону интересов Эксплораторов".

traits.locale_text: "The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I represent the Fleet on a diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

"The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I represent the Fleet on a diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

"The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

"The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

"The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

languages.text: 「生身の人間の情報処理能力が不足していると判断しました」{n}オプティコン-22は長い間沈黙し、しばらくすると口を開いた。{/n}「私は艦隊の外交使節団として機能し、積荷を監督し、信徒が探索艦隊の関心領域を侵さないように確認しています」
languages.original_text: "The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

traits.locale_text: 「生身の人間の情報処理能力が不足していると判断しました」{n}オプティコン-22は長い間沈黙し、しばらくすると口を開いた。{/n}「私は艦隊の外交使節団として機能し、積荷を監督し、信徒が探索艦隊の関心領域を侵さないように確認しています」

languages.text: “我缺乏肉体语言的信息能力。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号沉默了很长一段时间，随后开了口。{/n}“我负责执行舰队的外交工作，监督运输，防止教外人士入侵开拓者的利益范围。”
languages.original_text: "The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

traits.locale_text: “我缺乏肉体语言的信息能力。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号沉默了很长一段时间，随后开了口。{/n}“我负责执行舰队的外交工作，监督运输，防止教外人士入侵开拓者的利益范围。”

languages.text: «Las capacidades informativas del idioma cárnico son escasas». {n}Opticon-22 permanece en silencio durante mucho tiempo y, luego, espeta:{/n} «Me ocupo de la misión diplomática de la Flota, superviso los envíos y me aseguro de que los laicos no invadan la esfera de interés de los exploradores».
languages.original_text: "The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

traits.locale_text: «Las capacidades informativas del idioma cárnico son escasas». {n}Opticon-22 permanece en silencio durante mucho tiempo y, luego, espeta:{/n} «Me ocupo de la misión diplomática de la Flota, superviso los envíos y me aseguro de que los laicos no invadan la esfera de interés de los exploradores».

languages.text: « Le langage humain manque d'efficacité en ce qui concerne la transmission d'informations. » {n}Opticon-22 reste silencieux un bon moment, puis ajoute : {/n}« Je réalise les objectifs diplomatiques de la flotte, je supervise les livraisons et je veille à ce que les profanes n'empiètent pas sur la sphère d'intérêt des Explorators. »
languages.original_text: "The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

traits.locale_text: « Le langage humain manque d'efficacité en ce qui concerne la transmission d'informations. » {n}Opticon-22 reste silencieux un bon moment, puis ajoute : {/n}« Je réalise les objectifs diplomatiques de la flotte, je supervise les livraisons et je veille à ce que les profanes n'empiètent pas sur la sphère d'intérêt des Explorators. »

languages.text: "Es mangelt am Informationsgehalt von Fleischsprech." {n}Opticon-22 schweigt lange. Dann sagt er:{/n} "Ich bin die diplomatische Vertretung der Flotte, überwache Lieferungen und sorge dafür, dass der Laienstand sich nicht in die Interessen der Exploratoren mischt."
languages.original_text: "The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

traits.locale_text: "Es mangelt am Informationsgehalt von Fleischsprech." {n}Opticon-22 schweigt lange. Dann sagt er:{/n} "Ich bin die diplomatische Vertretung der Flotte, überwache Lieferungen und sorge dafür, dass der Laienstand sich nicht in die Interessen der Exploratoren mischt."

languages.text: "Beşer dilinin bilgi verme yeterliliği oldukça zayıf." {n}Opticon-22 bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Sonra konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Görevlerim Filo'nun diplomatik temsilciliğini yapmak, sevkiyatların teftişini sağlamak ve ruhban dışı sınıfın Keşiftör nüfuz alanını ihlal etmediğinden emin olmaktır."
languages.original_text: "The informational capabilities of flesh-speak are lacking." {n}Opticon-22 is silent for a long time. Then he says,{/n} "I function as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, oversee shipments, and ensure that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

traits.locale_text: "Beşer dilinin bilgi verme kabiliyeti oldukça düşük." {n}Opticon-22 bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Sonra konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Benim görevlerim Filo'nun diplomatik temsilciliğini yapmak, sevkiyatların kontrolünü sağlamak ve kâfirlerin Keşiftör ilgi alanını taciz etmediğinden emin olmaktır."
